titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for commuting expenses incurred on public mass transit.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers an income tax deduction from gross income for commuting expenses incurred on public mass transit, including rail and bus service. Limits the amount of such deduction to $250 per year.
